title: Five CES 2024 products I'd buy as soon they'd take my money
description: CES 2024 saw more real product launches than any CES in recent memory. And these are the products I wouldn't hesitate to buy.

title: Microsoft unveils a slew of Copilot updates, including Copilot Pro. Here's what's new
description: Copilot Pro can get you advanced writing and coding assistance, access to OpenAI's GPT-4 Turbo, and more.

title: This AI-enabled e-bike uses ChatGPT to give you a smarter ride
description: AI integration was a key focus of CES 2024 and one company is taking that experience mobile with an always connected e-bike that serves as the hub for interactions, coaching, and fitness data collection.
